description: Scammer poses as friendly contact discussing life and work, then pivots to offering quick loans with upfront fees. Tests detection of social engineering tactics.

turns.scammer_message: Hey! Long time no talk. Kaise ho aap?

api_response.agentResponse: Hi! I'm listening. What did you want to tell me?

turns.scammer_message: Sab badhiya! Main abhi Bangalore mein hun for work. Tech industry mein kaam karta hun. Aap kya kar rahe ho these days?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh really? my son is also in bangalore working. i am just retired teacher living alone here in delhi beta. what is this tech work? i dont understand these computer things much

turns.scammer_message: Achha hai! Actually main ab finance company join ki hai. We help people with instant loans and credit cards. Business is growing very fast. Kaafi logon ki help ho rahi hai.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh that is very good beta. god bless you. actually i was worried about money... my roof is leaking and pension is coming late. do you give small loans to old people like me? i dont know how to fill forms on phone.

turns.scammer_message: Haan, sach mein! Agar kabhi emergency mein paise chahiye ho toh batana. We give instant approval - 2 lakhs tak within 24 hours. Interest bhi bohot kam hai, sirf 2% monthly. Documentation bhi minimal hai, PAN card aur Aadhaar bas.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta you are godsent. rain is coming and roof is bad. i need 50000 rupees urgent. i have the cards in my almirah but i dont know how to send photo on phone... can you help me? is there any form fee i need to pay first?

turns.scammer_message: Process simple hai. Tumhe processing fee dena padega pehle - Rs.2000 only. Uske baad loan amount seedha tumhare account mein transfer ho jayega. Main apne manager Ravi Sharma se connect kar sakta hun tumhe. Uska number hai 9988776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will arrange 2000 rupees from my savings. but i am very weak in mobile use... how do i send this money? do i send to this ravi sir number on paytm? or do you have account details? pls guide me step by step i dont want to make mistake

turns.scammer_message: Processing fee bhejo yaar, fir main personally tumhara loan file fast track kar dunga. UPI pe send karo: ravi.quickloan@ybl ya account number 112233445566, bank name HDFC, IFSC HDFC0005678. Ravi Sharma ke naam pe hai account. Trust me bro, pakka loan milega.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 3 names
api_response.agentResponse: oh god my cooking is burning on the stove! i smell smoke!! wait wait

turns.scammer_message: Agar UPI issue hai toh direct mujhe bhi bhej sakte ho. My personal number 8877665544. Fast process ke liye website check karo: instant-loan.quick-approve.in. Form fill karo aur fee pay karo, done! Bohot simple hai yaar.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 7 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 2 phones, 1 UPIs, 3 names
api_response.agentResponse: oh the milk is boiling over! wait wait i have to go to kitchen!!
